file_content.text: You have suggested kicking <<1>> from your group.
Enter your reason for kicking this player from the group:
<<1>> suggests <<2>> should be kicked from the group.
<<1>> suggests you should be kicked from the group.

The Activity Finder can place you in a QUEUE for destinations that you specify:
-First, 'Select Your Role' to specify which Role you wish to play as in a group. -Next, select the 'Destination' that you want to consider for a match. -Finally, press 'JOIN QUEUE' to enter the queue.
Note: You will not be matched with players on your Ignore List.
Your group is currently paused in the queue because of an invalid group composition.
You are currently locked out of Flashpoints, Uprisings and Operations for leaving. You may not enter the queue until the lock out timer expires.
Cannot enter queue because you have the maximum number of allowed missions in your mission log.
Role: Damage. This role focuses on lowering the health of enemies.
Role: Heal. This role focuses on sustaining group health.
Role: Tank. This role focuses on keeping enemy attention.
Choose selections for the activity finder queue.
Toggle consideration to join groups already progressing through the selected destinations.
Group role selections may need adjustment to enter the Activity Finder queue.
Daily reward bonus is unavailable with current filtered selections.
The Activity Window is not available until level 10.
You currently have a conflicting phase.
This action is not available while you are in a pvp match.
When the group is formed, you will be removed from your current phase.
When the group is formed, you will be removed from your current warzone.
Destinations Selected By The Group Leader:
When the group is formed, you will be removed from your current warzone queue.
When the group is formed, you will be removed from your current phase and warzone queues.
You are not in a queue for an activity.
You are in a queue with the activity finder.
Your group is in a queue with the activity finder.
You cannot enter the queue because you have recently left a group destination. Please wait until your lock out timer expires.
Your group is queued with the activity finder but progress is paused because of an invalid configuration.
Your group is eligible to find a replacement player. Re-queue your group to quickly replace the lost group member.
Activity Finder will consider you for the selected Roles when finding a group.
You are ineligible for this selection.
When all members select 'Ready' for the group, you will be removed from your Warzone.
When all members select 'Ready' for the group, you will be removed from your Phase.
You may not perform this action while a group invitation is pending.
Your group members current role selections:
If valid roles are not selected within the timelimit, your group will be removed from the queue.
Time remaining until group is removed from queue.

Operations are complex, challenging missions that require 8 players to complete. Operations require greater player skill and coordination for success.
Queueing for an Operation through Activity Finder will place you in a group for the currently active Operation and Bolster your equipment to the required rating.
Be sure to pick up the following missions on the Fleet for additional experience and credits:
[WEEKLY] The Ravagers [WEEKLY] Temple of Sacrifice [WEEKLY] The Dread Fortress [WEEKLY] The Dread Palace [WEEKLY] Terror From Beyond [WEEKLY] Scum and Villainy [WEEKLY] The Eternity Vault [WEEKLY] Karagga's Palace [WEEKLY] Explosive Conflict [WEEKLY] Gods from the Machine
Master Mode Flashpoints are challenging, group-focused missions that will test your mettle in combat as well as your ability to coordinate with a team of four players.

Master Mode Flashpoints are challenging, group-focused missions that will test your mettle in combat as well as your ability to coordinate with a team of four players.
Be sure to pick up the following mission on the Fleet for additional experience and credits.
[WEEKLY] Galactic Conflicts

Veteran Mode Flashpoints are story-driven, group endeavors that provide both challenge and reward.
Flashpoint availability and daily rewards will change as you increase in level. This category does not enforce any specific group roles, although includes limits of 2 Healers or 3 Tanks maximum.
Be sure to pick up the following mission on the Fleet for additional experience and credits.
[DAILY] Emerging Conflicts
You may not enter the activity finder queue while in a group pvp queue.

Planetary Destinations offer a quick way to find other people pursuing group missions on a particular planet.
Some destinations are tailored towards the Bonus Series missions for a planet while others for the Daily missions.
Note: Planetary destinations do not currently offer shuttle service.
Your group is currently in queue. Only the group leader may exit the queue.
Your selected Roles have changed. Please select 'Update Roles' below to confirm these changes.
<<1>> of <<2>> weekly flashpoint loot rolls remaining.

Free-to-Play Players have access to three (3) rolls on the loot from flashpoint final bosses per week.
A Weekly Pass may be purchased from the Cartel Market, which allows unlimited rolls for seven (7) days.
Weekly Operation Passes are available in the Cartel Market.

Free-to-Play Players do not have access to Operations without a Weekly Pass.
A Weekly Pass may be purchased from the Cartel Market, which allows Operations access for seven (7) days.
Activities are disabled until the full version of the game has been fully downloaded.
Veteran Mode Uprisings are fast, action-packed instances for a group of experienced players who seek a greater challenge.
Veteran Mode Flashpoints are tactical, role-neutral missions balanced for a group of four players. Players below the maximum level will be bolstered to the appropriate item level.
Cannot enter queue because you have the maximum number of allowed pending mission rewards.
Story Mode Uprisings are fast, role-neutral instances balanced for a group of four players.
Master Mode Uprisings are fast, action-packed instances for an advanced group of players who wish to test their considerable skill.
Only the group leader can queue for groupfinder activities.
You are ineligible for PvE Activity Finder.
You cannot queue for an activity while you have an active phase.
You cannot queue for this activity while you have an active phase.
Repeatable reward unavailable with current filtered selections.
Role-In-Need reward unavailable with current selections. Please ensure you are queued for all eligible content and are the specified role-in-need.
Operations are complex, challenging missions that require 8 players to complete. Operations require greater player skill and coordination for success.
Only the group leader may queue for an activity
You are currently searching for a replacement.
Only the group leader can perform this action.
Travel will be available as soon as the group leader requests to backfill the group.
Would you like to backfill your group?
This group is engaged in content and can only be backfilled using the Activity Window
This activity requires you or a group member to select a Discipline from the Combat Proficiencies Window
